apiProducts.label: GET Parameter
apiProducts.description: This API brings detailed information about VakıfBank parameters.

apiProducts.label: Verify OTP
apiProducts.description: This API authenticates the user who sent the OTP. The OTP timeout is 3 minutes and the trial limit is 3.

apiProducts.label: Send OTP
apiProducts.description: This API sends OTP to mobile phone for user authentication. If the user is a VakıfBank customer, it is expected to enter the mobile phone number registered in the system.

apiProducts.label: Execute Transaction
apiProducts.description: This API ensures that the transaction is carried out by verifying the OTP code sent to the customer in transactions that require customer approval, such as money transfer.

apiProducts.label: BIST Prices
apiProducts.description: This API returns the BIST 30 and BIST 100 prices on the requested date.

apiProducts.label: Gold Prices
apiProducts.description: This API returns the gold prices for the requested date.

apiProducts.label: Fund Prices
apiProducts.description: This API returns the fund prices for the requested date.

apiProducts.label: Precious Metal Prices
apiProducts.description: This API returns the prices of precious metals for the requested date.

apiProducts.label: F/X Currency Rates
apiProducts.description: This API returns the exchange rates for the requested date.

apiProducts.label: Investment Products Interest Rates
apiProducts.description: This API returns the interest rate information for the requested date and investment product type.

apiProducts.label: Product and Service Fees
apiProducts.description: This API brings the product and service prices of our bank.

apiProducts.label: Time Deposit Rates
apiProducts.description: This API returns the interest rate information of the time deposit product specified in the input information.

apiProducts.label: IBAN Validate
apiProducts.description: https://apiportal.vakifbank.com.tr/en/documentation/InformationServices/ibanValidate
apiProducts.documentationUrl: This API provides validity check for IBAN.

apiProducts.label: Loan Product List
apiProducts.description: This API brings the list of our bank's personal loan products.

apiProducts.label: Loan Calculator
apiProducts.description: This API calculates the cost rate of the individual loan product specified in the input information. It also creates a detailed payment plan.

apiProducts.label: Bond Bill Eurobond Product List
apiProducts.description: This API brings up the list of bonds, bonds and eurobond products.

apiProducts.label: Bond Bill Eurobond Calculator
apiProducts.description: This API calculates the buying and selling transactions of bonds, bills and eurobond products. It is mandatory to enter one of the nominal number or amount fields.

apiProducts.label: Cash Installment Calculator
apiProducts.description: This API calculates the installment amount of the cash advance withdrawn from the credit card.

apiProducts.label: F/X Currency Calculator
apiProducts.description: This API calculates the target exchange rate equivalent of a certain amount in the source exchange rate specified in the input information.

apiProducts.label: Deposit Product List
apiProducts.description: This API brings the list of deposit products of our bank.

apiProducts.label: Deposit Calculator
apiProducts.description: This API calculates our bank's return on deposits according to the deposit type specified in the input information.

apiProducts.label: Check Working Day
apiProducts.description: This API brings the information of our bank's business and holiday days. The days are filtered by date range.

apiProducts.label: Vakifbank Branch List
apiProducts.description: This API brings the information of the branches of our bank. Branches are filtered by region.

apiProducts.label: Vakifbank ATM List
apiProducts.description: This API brings the information of our bank's ATMs. ATMs are filtered by region.

apiProducts.label: VakıfBank Nearest Branch and ATM
apiProducts.description: This API lists the information of the nearest branches and ATMs of our bank according to the location information entered. The first 10 values ​​are shown in the list.

apiProducts.label: Bank List
apiProducts.description: This API brings up the list of banks operating in Turkey.

apiProducts.label: Bank Branch List
apiProducts.description: This API brings the list of all bank branches in Turkey. Branches are filtered by bank and city.

apiProducts.label: City List
apiProducts.description: This API returns the list of cities in Turkey.

apiProducts.label: District List
apiProducts.description: This API brings the list of Districts in Turkey. The list is filtered by the selected city.

apiProducts.label: Neighborhood List
apiProducts.description: This API returns the list of neighborhoods in Turkey. The list is filtered by the selected county.

apiProducts.label: Account List
apiProducts.description: This API lists the accounts that the customer is authorized.

apiProducts.label: Account Detail
apiProducts.description: This API returns the details of the customer's authorized account.

apiProducts.label: Account Transactions
apiProducts.description: This API retrieves account activity information of the customer's account. Transactions are filtered by date range.

apiProducts.label: Inquire Receipt
apiProducts.description: This API brings the receipt of the account transaction that the customer is authorized. Receipt can be taken as pdf or txt.

apiProducts.label: Transfer to Another VakıfBank Account
apiProducts.description: This API performs account-to-account transfers and transfers. In order to complete the transaction, OTP verification from the Transaction API is required.

apiProducts.label: Transfer to Another VakıfBank Account (to IBAN)
apiProducts.description: This API performs transfer and transfer transactions from account to IBAN. In order to complete the transaction, OTP verification from the Transaction API is required.

apiProducts.label: Transfer to VakıfBank Account with Name
apiProducts.description: This API performs account-to-name transfer. In order to complete the transaction, OTP verification from the Transaction API is required. Buyer's T.C. It is mandatory to enter one of the ID number or tax number fields.

apiProducts.label: Transfer to Another VakifBank Credit Card
apiProducts.description: This API performs account-to-card transfer. In order to complete the transaction, OTP verification from the Transaction API is required.

apiProducts.label: Transfer To Phone Number
apiProducts.description: This API performs the money transfer process to the mobile phone. In order to complete the transaction, OTP verification from the Transaction API is required.

apiProducts.label: EFT to Account Number
apiProducts.description: This API performs the account-to-account EFT transaction. In order to complete the transaction, OTP verification from the Transaction API is required.

apiProducts.label: EFT to IBAN
apiProducts.description: This API makes EFT transaction account to IBAN. You have to use “Execute Transaction API” for complete your transaction.

apiProducts.label: EFT to Name
apiProducts.description: This API makes EFT transaction account to name. You have to use “Execute Transaction API” for complete your transaction. One of receiver T.R. Identity or Tax Identity number is mandatory.

apiProducts.label: EFT to Credit Card
apiProducts.description: This API makes EFT transaction account to credit card. You have to use “Execute Transaction API” for complete your transaction.

apiProducts.label: Card List
apiProducts.description: This API lists customer authorized cards.

apiProducts.label: Card Details
apiProducts.description: This API returns details of customer authorized card.

apiProducts.label: Card Current Term Transactions
apiProducts.description: This API returns current term transactions of authorized card.

apiProducts.label: Card Balance Information
apiProducts.description: This API returns balance information of customer authorized card.

apiProducts.label: Card Statement List
apiProducts.description: This API returns statement list of customer authorized main card.

apiProducts.label: Card Statement
apiProducts.description: This API returns main card statement of authorized card.

apiProducts.label: Credit Card Application
apiProducts.description: You may apply credit card using this API. Before application customer confirms with Send OTP and Verify OTP API’s

apiProducts.label: Personal Loan Application
apiProducts.description: Personal loan is applied using this API.

apiProducts.label: Personal Loan Confirm
apiProducts.description: Personal loan application is confirmed with using this API.

apiProducts.label: Personal Loan Cancellation
apiProducts.description: Personal loan application is canceled with using this API.

apiProducts.label: Donation Inquiry
apiProducts.description: This API lists institution’s donation transactions.

apiProducts.label: HGS Inquire Product
apiProducts.description: This API returns customer’s authorized products of passing system. Maximum 2000 recorcd can list each request.

apiProducts.label: HGS Inquire Balance and Transaction
apiProducts.description: This API returns customer’s authorized HGS product balance and transaction Each page has maxiımum 1000 records. Start and end date must be maximum 1 year.

apiProducts.label: HGS Inquire Passing
apiProducts.description: This API returns customer authorized product passing informations. Each page has maximum 1000 records. Start and end date range must be maximum 1 year.

apiProducts.label: DDS Main Company Questioning
apiProducts.description: This API retursn main company informations on system.

apiProducts.label: DDS Limit-Risk Questioning
apiProducts.description: This API returns dealer limit-risk informations.

apiProducts.label: DDS Invoice Questioning
apiProducts.description: This API returns invoice informations on system.

apiProducts.label: DDS Invoice Upload
apiProducts.description: New invoices save for using this API.

apiProducts.label: DDS Invoice Update
apiProducts.description: This api updates invoices which are uploaded before. Only invoice amount and last payment date can update.

apiProducts.label: DDS Invoice Cancel
apiProducts.description: This api cancels invoices whichs are uploaded by dealer before.

apiProducts.label: DDS Invoice Offset
apiProducts.description: This api offsets invoice which is uploaded by dealer before.
